element.hint: Does not have any experience or knowledge
element.label: None

element.hint: Is in the process of learning
element.label: Learning

element.hint: Has working level experience but may require oversight
element.label: Working Knowledge

element.hint: Has the necessary ability and knowledge and requires little oversight
element.label: Competent

element.hint: Is classed as a Subject Matter Expert in this field. Can train or coach others
element.label: Expert
